column5: The MSc Advanced Practice (Midwifery) aims to provide registered midwives with opportunities to expand knowledge and skills personally and professionally, towards becoming a competent practitioner at advanced practice level. The MSc Advanced Practice (Midwifery) enables experienced registered midwives to develop an expert knowledge base, complex decision-making skills, and clinical competencies for an expanded autonomous scope of practice.  Further information can be found on the Nursing and Midwifery webpage - click
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
